text: Radar Guided Missiles are a form of anti-aircraft weaponry carried by military aircraft. They use 2 distinct types of seekers. Semi-Active Radar Homing (SARH) and Active Radar Homing (ARH). SARH missiles use the aircraftâ€™s radar to lock onto targets, while ARH missiles have their own guidance system on the missile. Radar guidance or radar-guided can be * Active radar guidance * Semi- active radar guidance * Passive radar guidance * Radar altimeter guidance Category:Missiles
title: Radar-guided missile
